name: Neighbor's Dark Riddle Mod
description: I thought that this wasn't going to be mod. But then, when I thought about modding, I now know that this should be a mod for this game. So, later on, I thought that  I should make a video about this. But then, I now know that my "Samsung Galaxy Tab A" didn't think that it was a game so I could use the gameplay features, "Game Launcher". So, I thought about doing video about the game, with a different screen recorder,  and told the viewers how to get it. But then, I realized that it wasn't much a deal for others to showcase it. So, decided to make a download to it when I got "Apk Analyzer" that was supposed to work for me on a project. So, that's what i'm doing right now. You can see the details I show you, it looks runned-down, the can get stuck running nowhere in the same position,  and other features that it includes that I do not show to you, you could check it out playing it, or watching me play it on "YouTube".
